elements.text:
Disability and Access Resource from Showing Up for Racial Justice: Want to learn more about Disability Justice? These Google Docs from Showing Up for Racial Justice will teach you how to become a better disability activist. https://surj.org/resources/disability-and-access/

HDSA: Take Action: Want to make your voice heard? Connect with HDSA to learn more about how you can take action. https://hdsa.org/advocacyhome/TakeAction/

Respectability's LGBTQ+ People with Disabilities Resources:Learn more about the intersection of disability and LGBTQ+ identities. https://www.respectability.org/resources/lgbtq/
